item.description:
The Run: Get your daily sweat started Monday evenings with the Prulu Run Club. Any and all are welcome. Run Club meets at lululemon Prudential Center at 5:45pm*

Post Run Meet Up: Back Bay Social Club (867 Boylston) BBSC will be hosting some yummy appetizers I hear. 

Distance: 5mile Route TBD around scenic Downtown Boston along the Charles River Esplanade. Breathtaking views of downtown Boston and good company...guaranteed.

*you can leave your stuff in a dressing room at lululemon
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be getting our stretch on.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: lululemon FunRun+apps
